scripts.post-build: cp manifest.json build/ && echo '✅ Build completed with manifest copied'
scripts.validate: npm run validate-structure && npm run validate-config
scripts.validate-structure: echo '🔍 Validating project structure...' && test -f src/App.js && test -f src/components/AirportApp.jsx && echo '✅ Structure validation passed'
scripts.validate-config: echo '🔍 Validating configuration...' && node -e "require('./src/services/config.js'); console.log('✅ Config validation passed')"
